snippet: Dr. Elshtain was a philosopher of politics and religion who wrote influentially about good and evil, war and peace, and the moral imperative of American global military engagement.
abstract: Jean Bethke Elshtain, philosopher of politics and religion who wrote influentially about good and evil, war and peace and the moral imperative of American global military engagement, dies at age 72.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Elshtain was a philosopher of politics and religion who wrote influentially about good and evil, war and peace, and the moral imperative of American global military engagement.

headline.main: Jean Bethke Elshtain, a Guiding Light for Policy Makers After 9/11, Dies at 72
headline.print_headline: Jean Bethke Elshtain, a Guiding Light For Policy Makers After 9/11, Dies at 72
